name: SmogGusters
description:
TO PLAY:

1)Download and unzip the exe and the data folder into the same folder.

2)Run the exe

In SmogGusters, you play as an... eccentric inventor, who has made a modified vacuum cleaner to create paths through the Great Smog Of London, so that people can walk through it safely. 

For some more information on the game and creating it, you can look at my wordpress here! Twitter: @JamesBriggs123

CONTROLS:

WASD for movement.

Use the Mouse to Aim

Left Click sucks in smog and Right Click shoots it out.

You only have so much room in your tank!

THANKS FOR PLAYING!!! <3
